Master Vegetable Marinade Recipe | Bon Appétit

Stir in your favorite fresh herbs just before serving.IngredientsMakes about 1 cup½cup extra-virgin olive oil½cup sherry vinegar or red wine vinegar2tsp. kosher salt1½tsp. honeyPreparationWhisk oil, vinegar, salt, and honey in a medium bowl to combine.How would you rate Master Vegetable Marinade?Leave a ReviewTell us what you thinkReviews (1)Back to TopTriangleLove it!AnonymousAlabama6/5/2021Explore Bon AppétitMarinadeQuickEasyDairy-FreeGluten-FreeNut-FreeVegetarianKetoHealthyishRecipes you want to make.
